Database

Class SHA256Hash

  • java.lang.Object
    • Database.Hash
      • Database.SHA256Hash

  • public class SHA256Hash
extends Hash
    Implementation of the abstract Hash class, using the SHA-256 Algorithm (of the SHA-2 family) It alternates between appending and prepending the salt, over many iterations in order to increase difficulty in brute-forcing the password.
    Author:
    draringi

    • Method Detail

      • hash

        public java.lang.String hash(java.lang.String password,
                    java.lang.String salt)
                      throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Hashes password using the SHA-256 Algorithm, and a given salt. Hashes through repetitions, alternating between appending and prepending the given salt.
        Specified by:
        hash in class Hash
        Parameters:
        password -
        salt -
        Returns:
        Hashed password
        Throws:
